sentences.en: Anyhow, we must find a way out of this impasse.
sentences.cn: 总要从死胡同里找个出路.

sentences.en: As has been argued, traditionally organized libraries have reached an impasse in terms of usability.
sentences.cn: 如前所述, 按传统方式组织的图书馆的可用性已陷入绝境.

sentences.en: I see no way out of this impasse.
It remained for Mr Parkhill to break through the impasse.
sentences.cn: 只有等待帕克希尔先生来打破僵局了.

sentences.en: Negotiations seemed to have reached an impasse.
sentences.cn: 谈判似乎已经陷入僵局.

sentences.en: The company says it has reached an impasse in negotiations with the union.
sentences.cn: 公司称与工会的谈判已陷入僵局。

sentences.en: The impasse was made worse by Jobert's passionate nature, which masqueraded as cynical nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 若贝尔以玩世不恭的态度掩饰感情奔放的天性, 这使局面越发僵化了.

sentences.en: The negotiations had reached an impasse, with both sides refusing to compromise.
sentences.cn: 由于双方都不肯妥协,谈判陷入僵局.

sentences.en: The negotiations have reached an impasse.
The proposal offered both sides a way out of the diplomatic impasse.
sentences.cn: 这一提议使双方都能摆脫外交僵局.

sentences.en: The spirit of the factors is the key out of the impasse.
sentences.cn: 其中,精神因素是走出绝境的关键.

sentences.en: This is the usual refuge of diplomats unable to agree, unwilling to admit the impasse.
sentences.cn: 这是外交人员在无法赞同 、 又不愿承认僵局时惯用的回避手段.

sentences.en: This was at least a temporary relief from the impasse.
sentences.cn: 这至少使我暂时摆脱了僵局.

sentences.en: This was the impending impasse to which Rider addressed himself.
sentences.cn: 雷德强调,图书馆目前正面临着日益逼近的绝境.

sentences.en: We seem to have reached an impasse.

trans.tran_en: a situation in which it is impossible to continue with a discussion or plan because the people involved cannot agree
